nodes.bodyText: @victornoel I didn't understood this test, seems that nothing is being done... Also, could you try to put it in just one assertion?
@paulodamaso I wanted to verify that that the iterable could be iterated multiple times, I will transform it so that it's clearer and also with only one assertion
@victornoel Well, I think that it was better the other way, could you please change it back?
